name: cosypos
description: Modern restaurant management system with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend-deploy && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend-deploy && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.db:push: cd backend-deploy && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Brainstorm Collaboration
